item.title: CVE-2014-3622|2024-08-06T10:50:17.792Z -- php -- php
item.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the add_post_var function in the Posthandler component in PHP 5.6.x before 5.6.1 might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging a third-party filter extension that accesses a certain ksep value.
